channel.title: Hyperbolic Geometry on Franz Louis Cesista
channel.description: Recent content in Hyperbolic Geometry on Franz Louis Cesista

item.title: Flash Hyperbolic Attention Minimal [WIP]
item.description: A minimal implementation of Flash Attention 1 & 2 in just ~350 lines of CUDA code. This is still a work-in-progress, but the ultimate goal is to implement the various variations of Hyperbolic Attention in CUDA.
